Name: Shanty Speaker
Description:
This mod adds a new Iron Teeth building that plays "Shores of Beaver Bay" - the shanty song arranged by Zofia Domaradzka and recorded by Timberborn's players and developers in 2022.
If you're a modder, check out this mod for a showcase of Timberborn's custom 3D model format, Timbermesh.

Source code and other examples: https://github.com/mechanistry/timberborn-modding
